description: Associates the specified VPC with the specified local gateway route table.

parameters.name: LocalGatewayRouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the local gateway route table.

parameters.name: TagSpecifications
parameters.description: The tags to assign to the local gateway route table VPC association. (dict) --- The tags to apply to a resource when the resource is being created. When you specify a tag, you must specify the resource type to tag, otherwise the request will fail. ResourceType (string) --- The type of resource to tag on creation. Tags (list) --- The tags to apply to the resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of resource to tag on creation.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags to apply to the resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayRouteTableId
nested_items.description: The ID of the local gateway route table.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayRouteTableArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the local gateway route table for the association.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the local gateway.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the local gateway route table for the association.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the association.
